name: Spark
summary:
Supports up to 8 players in each lobby. 

In Copy Cat, take turns drawing and guessing each other's creations. 

VRUNO is your favorite family card game, with a disco dance twist. Try it out, and try to out dance your competition!

In High Roller, test your trivia knowledge and bet your way to success against the competition.

Clue Cove is a fantastically fun word clue guessing game on a beautiful beach! Two teams attempt to guess words given by their spy masters. Be the first to guess all of your teams...
